scripts.render:batch: bash -lc 'mkdir -p out/videos && for id in $(seq -f "%03g" 1 50); do npx remotion render src/index.ts "QuizVertical_${id}" "out/videos/quiz-${id}.mp4"; done'
scripts.render:thumbs: bash -lc 'mkdir -p out/thumbnails && for id in $(seq -f "%03g" 1 50); do npx remotion still src/index.ts "QuizThumb_${id}" "out/thumbnails/quiz-${id}.png"; done'
scripts.render:shorts: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const items=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('data/shorts/history.json','utf8')); fs.mkdirSync('out/shorts',{recursive:true}); const {spawnSync}=require('child_process'); for (const q of items){const id='short-'+q.id; const out='out/shorts/'+q.id+'.mp4'; const r=spawnSync('npx',['remotion','render','src/index.ts',id,out],{stdio:'inherit'}); if(r.status!==0) process.exit(r.status??1);} "
